//wc: with comment

//Hw5-4-1 I-type testing 
//111111111111 00101 000 00000 0010011 //addi x0 x5 -1
//0000000 00100 00001 001 00000 0010011//slli x0 x1 4
//1111 1111 1111 00001 010 00000 0010011//slti x0 x1 -1(x1=32.U)
//1111 1111 1111 00001 011 00000 0010011//sltui x0 x1 -1(x1=32.U)
//xori x0
//srli x0
//0100000 00001 00100 101 00000 0010011 //srai x0 x4 1(-4096 >> 1 = -2048)
//ori x0
//andi x0

//Hw5-4-2 R-type testing
//0000000 00100 00011 000 00000 0110011//add x0 x3 x4
0100000 00100 00011 000 00000 0110011//sub x0 x3 x4
//sll x0
//slt x0
//sltu x0
//xor x0
//srl x0 
//sra x0
//0000000 00010 00001 101 00000 0110011//or x0 x1 x2
//and x0

//Hw5-4-6 Load/Store inst. testing
//0000 0000 0000 00000 000 00001 0000011//lb x1 x0 0 ffffffdd
//0000 0000 0010 00000 001 00001 0000011//lh x1 x0 2
//0000 0000 0000 00000 010 00001 0000011//lw x1 x0 0 aabbccdd
//lbu x1 x0 3
//0000 0000 0010 00000 101 00001 0000011//lhu x1 x0 2
//0000000 00101 00000 000 00000 0100011//sb x5 x0 0
//0000000 00001 00000 001 00000 0100011//sh x1 x0 2
//sw x1 x0 0

//Hw5-4-8 B-type testing
//beq x1 x1 24
//0 000000 00000 00001 001 0101 0 1100011//bne x1 x1 10
//0 000000 00010 00001 100 1000 0 1100011 //blt x1 x2 16
//bge x1 x0 12
//bltu x1 x1 8
//0 000000 00010 00001 111 0010 0 1100011//bgeu x1 x2 4 x1=-36864 x2=2 jmp=true

//Hw5-4-9 J-type testing
//1 1111101100 1 11111111 00000 1101111//jal x0 -20
//000000010000 00100 000 00000 1100111//jalr x0 x4 16
